name: Stranded In The Depths
description:
During a mission on a foreign planet, your ship ended up stranded in the depths.

You have to escape and avoid losing your fuel or hitting objects.

Be wise: trust your flashlight. it will guide you.

Controls? WASD and Space to thrust. the only power up you have, is a fuel canteen. you will recognize it easily.

And don't worry. this is a race against yourself. Are you up to it?
